{"images":[{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230520/2023052006321867780868.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230520/2023052006321885818848.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230520/202305200632186886833.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":7,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三遍通临完成。自我感觉是有进步的，写的越来越放松，没把握的笔画也越来越少，不过有时候又觉得没有开始时写的仔细。下一遍还是继续这样练习吗。\n最后附三次的首页。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230514/2023051406383547480491.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230514/2023051406383530013521.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230514/2023051406383494018607.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":8,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第二遍通临完成，第三遍开始。两天全身心练习，感觉甚好。明天尝试早起，把一天最好的时光用在写字上。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221214/2022121402201303778056.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221214/2022121402201408666505.jpg","idx":1},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221214/2022121402201419630102.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"趁上午不难受赶紧练习，浑身热乎乎的，应该有利于恢复。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221204/2022120402253128121909.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221204/2022120402253127225965.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这两天看书突然想到老师的心法，开始练横一方面是打基础，感知毛笔特性，更重要的是提升静心专注的能力，而要心静就要忘记自己的目的，只专注于当下的笔画。感觉无论书法，打坐还是其他悟道之法都殊途同归，先忘记目的，心静下来，从多到少，再从有到无，也就接近了道。\n这段时候停下来检视下自己挺好，发现前段虽然笔画有所提升，但都是术，忘记了对心境的磨练，所以状态不能自己掌控，周末心静了就写的好点，平时难以专注进去。","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221023/2022102310414263267478.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221023/2022102310414658748062.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练习过程中发现问题不能掩盖，要敢于揭丑亮短，前几天笔画没有质感应该是起笔聚峰不好，特别是横完全没有摩擦的感觉，明天要再看看视频，专项练习改正过来。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221022/2022102207343174547538.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221022/2022102207343209378906.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"没感觉的时候拉一拉线条还是有帮助的，可以走出牛角尖，更专注于每一笔。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221020/2022102011001476074483.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"继续练字，感觉没什么长进，慢慢积累","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2736,"height":3648,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221019/2022101911504154039436.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"继续练习皇字，最后两个字因为有事写的不好，可见心静的重要性。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221018/2022101810092376936852.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3648,"height":2735,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221018/2022101810092391918814.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"这两笔是皇字的短板，突破不了这个字就过不了关。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221016/2022101612021624481304.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221016/2022101612021758050796.jpg","idx":1},{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221016/2022101612021370399775.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":4,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"庆贺党的二十大胜利召开。\n青年同志要胸怀梦想又脚踏实地。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221015/2022101502152037013103.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221015/2022101502153242091639.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"练字和画矩形，越来越喜欢竹叶毛边纸，摩擦力很大，可以慢慢书写。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3443,"height":2319,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221013/2022101310112831871262.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221013/2022101310112845538505.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"大臂没有打开，离的远的字就会存在侧锋的情况，以后要重点改正，增加大臂的稳定性。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221011/2022101108242478436939.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"继续练习，还是不够稳，衔接处总是做不好","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3648,"height":2736,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20221009/202210090840074765076.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"又只能在单位练习，新笔新纸还行","hasMore":false}
